name: Shouyang Jingfu Coal Mine

The Shouyang Jingfu Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Nanzhuang Village, Shouyang County, Jinzhong City, Shanxi province, China

operators: Yang Quan Coal Industry Group Shouyang Jingfu Coal Co., Ltd.
owners: Yang Quan Coal Industry Group Shouyang Jingfu Coal Co., Ltd.
web_search_companies.notes: The company exploits and sells anthracite and other coal products throughout China.
